EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Confirmation - Detroit
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in Detroit. See event details below:
Date: April 18, 2016 Time: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Location: Automation Alley, 2675 Bellingham Dr, Troy, MI 48083
{{my.Save the Date Detroit}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]>.
